text: People w/ #Parkinsons speak out as leading #neurologists back #COVID19 #vaccine – @basbloem & @KRayChaudhuri1 say people w/ #Parkinson’s should have a COVID-19 vaccine, we asked those living w/ the condition how they feel about having the #immunisation: https://t.co/ac1Y4R8Ugm https://t.co/KLr0BkmOqB
